message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! It's a unique opportunity to own a high-quality item that I'm confident you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $9000.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $7500. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. After considering your proposal, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm now offering the product to you for $8250.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $7000. Would you be willing to go down to that price?
